document_data.name: Calindra
document_data.mainbody: '''Calindra''' was a female [[human]] of [[Port Llast]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].

History.Gameplay:
The [[Kalach-Cha]] and the companions could encounter Calindra in the [[Alliance Arms Inn]], who would ask them to find Bradly. Bradly was actually taken by [[gnome|gnomish]] [[werewolf|werewolves]] who wanted to make him a werewolf as well, but left him dead in a cave in the [[Duskwood]], where he could be found. They could report back to Calindra if they discovered the miner's fate.

After the Kalach-Cha became the Captain of [[Crossroad Keep]], Calindra could have been employed as a miner to dig through the ore mines that the Kalach-Cha could find on their travels.
